flawed_nl_solution:
If Kameron has 100 kangaroos, he has 100-20= <<100-20=110>>110 more kangaroos than Bert.
Buying 2 kangaroos every day, it will take Bert 110/2=55 days to have the same number of kangaroos as Kameron has now.
#### 55

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 80, not 110. It appears there was a miscalculation with the digits before the final zero.
